name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: A heavy suit of armor made from steel plates.
looks: The armor is made of interlocking steel plates, providing excellent protection. It has a polished finish and is adorned with intricate engravings.

name: Enchanted Sword

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Shield of Protection
description: A sturdy shield that offers excellent defensive capabilities.
looks: The shield is made of reinforced steel with a polished surface. It is adorned with intricate engravings of shields and swords.

special_effects.block: Increases the chance to block incoming attacks by 20%.

name: Axe of the Berserker
description: A fearsome battle axe that grants its wielder incredible strength and rage.
looks: The Axe of the Berserker is a massive weapon with a thick, double-bladed head. The handle is wrapped in animal fur, giving it a primal look.

special_weapon_skills.berserker_fury: Increases damage and attack speed while in a berserk state.

special_effects.berserk_rage: Has a chance to trigger a berserk state, increasing damage output but reducing defense.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that radiates healing energy.
looks: The staff has a long wooden shaft adorned with intricate carvings of leaves and flowers. The top of the staff holds a glowing crystal that emits a soft white light.

special_effects.healing_touch: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells and abilities.

name: Enchanted Mace
description: A mace infused with magical enchantments, making it more powerful.
looks: The mace has a sturdy iron handle with engraved runes. The head of the mace is adorned with a glowing crystal that emits a faint blue light.

special_effects.enchanted_damage: Deals additional magical damage to enemies.

name: Staff of the Arcane
description: A mystical staff that harnesses the power of arcane magic.
looks: The staff is made of a rare, shimmering crystal material that refracts light in various colors. It has a spiral design that symbolizes the flow of magic.

special_effects.arcane_blast: Allows the wielder to unleash powerful arcane blasts at enemies.
